message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CY 

This paper deals with natural language processing and machine learning techniques to extract argument structure from texts. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also involves training classifiers and making predictions, which falls under the scope of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The use of word embeddings and linguistic features suggests the possibility of cs.IR (Information Retrieval) being a relevant category. Finally, the paper deals with argumentation, which could be related to cs.CY (Computers and Society).
